definition: to be bestowed, conferred, or granted by the emperor
to resist/imperial/(classical) to drive (a chariot)/to manage/to govern

sentences.english: This is the Nine Dragon Plaque presented by Emperor Yongzheng.
sentences.chinese: 这是雍正皇帝御赐的九龙匾。

sentences.english: The emperor presented the plaque to Cha, the wife of Chen Shen, Minister of Rites.
sentences.chinese: 是皇帝御赐给陈家礼部尚书陈诜的妻子的。

definition: to award (a prize)/to confer on sb/to confer upon by authority
to appoint sb to a post or confer a title on sb by imperial order
to bestow/to confer (a reward for service)/a reward
horizontal rectangular inscribed tablet hung over a door or on a wall/shallow round woven bamboo basket
cap badge (official sign of rank in Qing dynasty)
to seal up (a door with a paper seal, or a document)/to confer an additional title on a nobleman
